sentences.sContent: He is bitter about the inaction of the other political parties.
sentences.sCn: 他为其他政党的不作为感到愤愤不平。

words.tran: 不活跃的；不活动的；怠惰的；闲置的
静止；不活泼；休止状态；不放射性
[生物] 失活；[化学] 钝化（作用）
使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动

trans.tranOther: If you refer to someone's inaction, you disapprove of the fact that they are doing nothing
